T02D1253:243b-1: he badzra s'a dha nam tattva ao tyo ta ta ka ra n'a ma /
T02D1253:243b-3: dgyes pa'i rdo rje sgrub pa'i thabs de kho na nyid gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba /
T02D1253:243b-4: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1253:243b-5: aom dgyes pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1253:243b-6: gcig dang du mas dpyad pa'i snying pos sprul pa'i sgyu ma'i dngos //
T02D1253:243b-7: 'jig pa'i dus gyi sprin 'dra'i sku 'chad shes rab dam pas 'khyud //
T02D1253:243b-8: rdo rje las byung dag pa'i de nyid kyis sprul lha mos bskor //
T02D1253:243b-9: snying rjes khros pa'i gzugs can dgyes pa'i rdo rje rtag phyag 'tshal //
T02D1253:243b-10: rdo rje 'chang ba gang zhig gis //
T02D1253:243b-12: de gsal byed pa'i bla ma ni //
T02D1253:243b-13: dam tshig rdo rje la phyag 'tshal //
T02D1253:243b-14: dang por re zhig sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs
T02D1253:243b-15: kyi gnod pas skyo bar gyur pa'i sems can gyi
T02D1253:243b-17: snying rje phul du byung ba'i ros gang ba'i dbang
T02D1253:243b-18: du gyur pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa la sogs pa'i
T02D1253:243b-19: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu goms par byas pas
T02D1253:243b-20: / dag par gyur pa'i sems kyi rgyun dang ldan pa /
T02D1253:243b-21: dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur zhing rjes su gnang ba thob pa /
T02D1253:243b-22: dam tshig dang spyod pa la mkhas pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
T02D1253:243b-23: tho rangs langs la rang gi snying gar re pha
T02D1253:243b-24: las byung ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du
T02D1253:243b-25: mchog dang po'i yi ge h'u% bsam zhing /
T02D1253:243b-26: dur khrod la sogs pa'i yid du 'ong ba'i gnas
T02D1253:243b-27: 'ga' zhig tu gnas la bde ba'i stan la 'dug
T02D1253:243b-28: ste ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya dang ldan pas
T02D1253:243b-29: yi ge h'u% las byung ba'i 'od zer gyi lcags
T02D1253:243b-30: kyus / bcom ldan 'das 'chad par 'gyur ba'i kha
T02D1253:243b-31: dog dang phyag dang mtshon cha can bkug la nam
T02D1253:244a-1: tog la sogs pa'i mchod pas mchod nas /
T02D1253:244a-2: snying ga'i sa bon las byung ba'i goo r'i la
T02D1253:244a-3: sogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyis 'dod pa'i yon tan
T02D1253:244a-5: de la goo r'i ni ri dags kyis mtshan pa'i thod pa phyag na bsnams pa'o //
T02D1253:244a-6: tsoo r'i ni rang byung gi me tog gis gang ba'i snod kyis lag pa brel ba'o //
T02D1253:244a-7: be t'a li ni chu'i snod kyis lag gnyis pa brel bar gyur pa'o //
T02D1253:244a-8: gha sma r'i ni shas gang ba'i snod thogs pa'o //
T02D1253:244a-9: pukka s'i ni lag na tsandan gyis gang ba'i snod thogs pa'o //
T02D1253:244a-10: sha ba r'i ni snod nas sbrang rtsi ldugs par byed pa'o//
T02D1253:244a-11: tsanda l'i ni cang te'u brdung zhing mchod par byed pa'o //
T02D1253:244a-12: dombis ni mgul nas 'khyud cing snyoms par 'jug par byed do //
T02D1253:244a-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi mdun du sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya ste /
T02D1253:244a-14: bdag gi sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags par bgyi'o //
T02D1253:244a-15: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T02D1253:244a-16: so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ngo //
T02D1253:244a-17: bdag byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar
T02D1253:244a-18: du thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas
T02D1253:244a-20: theg pa chen po'i chos ma lus pa dang /
T02D1253:244a-21: byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa dang lha mo'i tshogs dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o //
T02D1253:244a-22: bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi ste /
T02D1253:244a-23: sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba bsgrub pa dang /
T02D1253:244a-24: 'di dag ji srid du mthar thug pa'i mya ngan
T02D1253:244a-25: las 'das pa sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la rab
T02D1253:244a-28: bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po'i lam 'di nyid la yang brten par bgyi'o //
T02D1253:244a-29: bdag nyid kyang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dbul lo //
T02D1253:244a-30: dge ba'i rtsa 'di dag thams cad kyang bla na
T02D1253:244a-31: med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
T02D1253:244a-32: yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o zhes brjod cing phyag 'tshal
T02D1253:244a-33: nas gtor ma yang byin la yi ge brgya pa
T02D1253:244a-34: brjod pas mnyes par yang bya ste //
T02D1253:244a-35: aom shr'i he ru ka sa ma ya ma nu
T02D1253:244a-36: p'a la ya he ru ka tve no pa ti
T02D1253:244b-0: shtha dri dho @244b me bha ba /
T02D1253:244b-1: aa nu rakto me bha ba /
T02D1253:244b-2: su to shyo me bha ba /
T02D1253:244b-3: su po shyo me bha ba /
T02D1253:244b-4: sarbba siddhi mme pra ya tstsha /
T02D1253:244b-5: sarbba ka rmma su tsa me tsi ttam shri ya: ku ru h'u%/
T02D1253:244b-6: ha ha ha ha ho: / bha ga b'a na
T02D1253:244b-7: he ru ka / ma me mu nytsa he ru
T02D1253:244b-8: kva bha ba ma h'a sa ma ya sa tva
T02D1253:244b-9: a'a: h'u% phat badzra mu: zhes bya bas gshegs su
T02D1253:244b-10: gsol lo // de nas sems can thams cad la
T02D1253:244b-11: bu gcig pa sdug pa ltar mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid
T02D1253:244b-13: de nyid sdug bsngal dang sdug bsngal gyi rgyu las
T02D1253:244b-14: bzlog par 'dod pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi snying rje
T02D1253:244b-15: dang / de dag nyid la lha'i bde ba bsgrub cing bskyed pa la dga' ba'i dga' ba dang /
T02D1253:244b-16: de nas de dag nyid la bla na med pa'i
T02D1253:244b-17: bde ba'i rnam pa'i lam sgrub par 'dod pa'i rnam
T02D1253:244b-18: pa can gyi btang snyoms bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1253:244b-19: 'gro ba ngo bo nyid kyis stong //
T02D1253:244b-20: mtshan ma med cing rgyu med de //
T02D1253:244b-21: thams cad rnam par rtog bral bas //
T02D1253:244b-22: smon lam dag kyang rnam par spangs //
T02D1253:244b-23: ma lus de ltar shes bya zhing //
T02D1253:244b-24: bdag gi sgyu 'dra'i sems nyid de //
T02D1253:244b-25: rnam pa ma rig pa yis bskyed //
T02D1253:244b-27: aom sh'u nya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'a tma ko & ham /
T02D1253:244b-28: zhes bya ba'i sngags rgyas byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D1253:244b-29: de nas bsrung pa'i don du //
T02D1253:244b-30: re phas nyi ma sngon du rnam bsgoms nas //
T02D1253:244b-31: nyi der h'u% byung sna tshogs rdo rje ste //
T02D1253:244b-32: rdo rje de nyid kyis ni ra ba dang //
T02D1253:244b-33: gur bcing ba yang rnam par bsgom par bya //
T02D1253:244b-35: nyi ma dang sna tshogs rdo rje dag las spros
T02D1253:244b-36: pas zhu zhing gcig du gyur pa las rnam par
T02D1253:244b-37: spros pas / 'og tu rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyis gzhi dang /
T02D1253:244b-38: steng du rdo rje gur dang /
T02D1253:244b-39: thad kar rdo rje ra ba dang /
T02D1253:244b-40: de yi phyi rol du rdo rje me 'bar ba
T02D1253:244b-41: bsgom par bya zhing sngags kyis kyang brtan par bya
T02D1253:244b-42: ste / aom ra ksha ra ksha h'u% h'u% h'u% phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1253:244b-44: de'i dkyil du chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i
T02D1253:244b-45: ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid ston ka'i zla ba
T02D1253:244b-46: ltar dkar ba'i chos 'byung zhes bya ba gru gsum
T02D1253:244b-47: nam mkha'i khams bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1253:244b-48: de'i dkyil du yi ge yam las byung ba'i rlung
T02D1253:244b-49: gi dkyil 'khor sngon po gzhu'i dbyibs can g-yo ba'i
T02D1253:245a-2: de'i steng du re pha las me'i dkyil 'khor gru
T02D1253:245a-3: gsum dmar po gru rnams su yi ge ram gyis
T02D1253:245a-4: mtshan pa'o // de'i steng du bam las byung ba'i
T02D1253:245a-5: chu'i dkyil 'khor zlum po kha dog dkar po bum
T02D1253:245a-6: mtshan pa'o // pas mtshan pa'o // de'i steng du
T02D1253:245a-7: lam las byung ba'i sa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa
T02D1253:245a-8: ser po zur rnams su rdo rjes mtshan pa bsgom
T02D1253:245a-9: mtshan pa'o // pas mtshan pa'o // par bya'o //
T02D1253:245a-10: de nyid du bsgom pa po de nyid 'jig rten
T02D1253:245a-11: las 'das pa'i ye shes kyi khyad par byed pa
T02D1253:245a-12: nyid du nges par gnas so //
T02D1253:245a-13: de nas chos 'byung gi nang du 'byung ba chen
T02D1253:245a-14: po bzhi yongs su gyur pa las byung ba'i sna
T02D1253:245a-15: tshogs padma'i steng gi sna tshogs rdo rje'i lta ba
T02D1253:245a-16: la thar pa chen po'i grong khyer rnam par snang
T02D1253:245a-17: mdzad kyi ngo bo rin po che sna tshogs kyi
T02D1253:245a-18: rang bzhin gyi gzhal yas khang ngo //
T02D1253:245a-19: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02D1253:245a-20: ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar brgyan //
T02D1253:245a-21: phreng ba rnga yab sna tshogs ldan //
T02D1253:245a-22: rdo rje thig gis rnam par brgyan //
T02D1253:245a-23: ba dan sna tshogs g-yo ba'i sna //
T02D1253:245a-24: dril bu g-yer kha'i sgra dang ldan //
T02D1253:245a-25: 'dod pa'i yon tan mchog mnga' ba'i //
T02D1253:245a-26: nye bar mkho bas rnam par brgyan //
T02D1253:245a-27: do shal do shal phyed pa dang //
T02D1253:245a-28: rta babs bzhi yis mdzes par byas //
T02D1253:245a-29: rin po che dang rnam ldan zhing //
T02D1253:245a-30: mda' yab phreng bas rnam par brgyan //
T02D1253:245a-31: gzugs kyi snam bur brgyad gnyis kyi //
T02D1253:245a-32: mchod pa'i lha mos mchod par byed //
T02D1253:245a-33: pi wang bsgyid ma sngon mo ste //
T02D1253:245a-34: glu ma gling bu ser mo nyid //
T02D1253:245a-35: gar ma rdza ma ljang gu nyid //
T02D1253:245a-36: dgod ma rdza rnga dkar zhing dmar //
T02D1253:245a-37: gar ma lag pa bskor ba ste //
T02D1253:245a-38: glu ma ting ting shag dang bcas //
T02D1253:245a-39: bdug pa la sngon me tog dkar //
T02D1253:245a-41: dri ma ro ma kha dog dmar //
T02D1253:245a-42: reg ma me long ljang dang ldan //
T02D1253:245a-43: chos ma dkar zhing rang rtags kyis //
T02D1253:245a-44: kun kyang lag pa gnyis pa'o //
T02D1253:245a-45: phyi rol dur khrod 'jigs pa ste //
T02D1253:245a-46: rdo rje ra ba'i nang nyid du //
T02D1253:245a-47: gdug cing drag dang thug pa dang //
T02D1253:245a-48: de bzhin 'bar ba'i phreng ba dang //
T02D1253:245a-49: 'jigs par byed pa'i thod pa can //
T02D1253:245a-50: g-yon nas shar sogs rim pa bzhin //
T02D1253:245a-51: drag tu dgod pa dbang ldan du //
T02D1253:245b-0: dbang phyug nags tshal @245b me yi mtshams //
T02D1253:245b-1: 'jigs byed mun pa bden bral du //
T02D1253:245b-2: rlung du k'i li k'i la sgrogs //
T02D1253:245b-3: shir sha aa shva kang ka li //
T02D1253:245b-4: ts'u ta'i shing ni shar sogs rim //
T02D1253:245b-5: shing chen ka ra nydza nyid dang //
T02D1253:245b-6: 'khri shing can dang aa rdzu na //
T02D1253:245b-7: dbang po nor sbyin zhags pa can //
T02D1253:245b-8: gshin rje'i rgyal po'i phyogs su 'dod //
T02D1253:245b-9: dbang ldan mtshams dang byin za dang //
T02D1253:245b-10: srin po'i dbang po rlung dag tu'o //
T02D1253:245b-11: nor rgyas bu dang ta ksha ka / kka rko ta dang padma dang //
T02D1253:245b-12: padma chen po hu lu nta //
T02D1253:245b-13: rigs ldan dang ni dung skyong nyid //
T02D1253:245b-15: ldog byed dang ni mthug po nyid //
T02D1253:245b-17: gtum pa rim bzhin sprin gyi bdag / de la
T02D1253:245b-18: brgya byin ni glang po che la zhon pa mdog
T02D1253:245b-19: ser po lag pa g-yon na rdo rjes mtshan pa'i
T02D1253:245b-21: nor sbyin ni gnod sbyin la zhon pa mdog ser
T02D1253:245b-22: po gsus pa 'phyang ba mi'u thung g-yon thod pa
T02D1253:245b-24: chu lha ni chu srin la zhon pa mdog dkar
T02D1253:245b-25: po sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i g-yon na thod
T02D1253:245b-26: pa dang zhags pa thogs pa'o //
T02D1253:245b-27: gshin rje ni ma he la zhon pa mdog sngon
T02D1253:245b-28: po lto 'phyong ba skra ser po gyen du brdzes
T02D1253:245b-29: pa mi'u thung gi gzugs can g-yon na thod pa
T02D1253:245b-31: dbang ldan ni glang po la zhon pa mig gsum
T02D1253:245b-32: pa mdog dkar po g-yon na thod pa dang mdung
T02D1253:245b-33: thogs pa'o // byin za ni ra skyes la zhon
T02D1253:245b-34: pa mdog dmar ser phyag bzhi pa skra ser po
T02D1253:245b-35: dbyu sgu gsum pa dang thod pa dang phreng ba
T02D1253:245b-36: thogs pa'o // 'dzin pa'o // srin po'i bdag po
T02D1253:245b-37: ni ro la zhon pa mi'u thung gi gzugs can
T02D1253:245b-38: mdog sngon po skra ser po gyen du 'bar ba
T02D1253:245b-39: gsus pa 'phyang ba g-yon na ral gri dang thod
T02D1253:245b-40: thogs pa'o // 'dzin pa'o // pa thogs pa'i //
T02D1253:245b-41: rlung gi bdag po ni mdog sngon po ri dags
T02D1253:245b-42: la zhon pa zhi ba'i gdong can ba dan thogs
T02D1253:245b-43: thogs pa'o // 'dzin pa'o // pa thogs pa'i //
T02D1253:245b-44: pa'o // 'jig rten skyong ba 'di dag kun rang
T02D1253:245b-45: gi mdog dang gdan dang phyag mtshan dang ldan zhing
T02D1253:245b-46: kun kyang g-yas kyis ni bcom ldan 'das la phyag
T02D1253:245b-47: thogs pa'o // 'dzin pa'o // pa thogs pa'i //
T02D1253:245b-48: pa'o // 'tshal ba'o // sprin rnams kyi kha dog
T02D1253:245b-49: ni 'jig rten skyong ba rnams lta bu'o //
T02D1253:245b-50: klu rnams ni de dag la gnas pa ste /
T02D1253:245b-51: kun kyang thal mo sbyar ba'o //
T02D1253:246a-0: shing brgyad la gnas pa'i zhing skyong @246a * //
T02D1253:246a-1: ba rnams ni phyogs skyong ba brgyad kyi bzhon pa
T02D1253:246a-2: rnams kyi gdong lta bu skra dmar ser gyen du
T02D1253:246a-3: brdzes pa bzhin gyur pa ste /
T02D1253:246a-4: shi ri sha la gnas pa ni lha'i dge 'dun zhes bya ba mdog dkar po'o //
T02D1253:246a-5: shing ts'u ta la gnas pa ni gshin rje zhes bya ba ste mdog sngon po'o //
T02D1253:246a-6: aa shva ka la gnas pa ni sprin gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba ste mdog dmar po'o //
T02D1253:246a-7: byang chub kyi shing la gnas pa ni gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon zhes bya ba ste /
T02D1253:246a-9: ka ra nydza'i shing la gnas pa ni drang srong 'dus pa zhes bya ba ste dmar po'o //
T02D1253:246a-10: 'khri shing can la gnas pa ni srin po'i tshogs can te kha dog sngon po'o //
T02D1253:246a-11: aa rdzu na la gnas pa ni rlung gi rgyal po zhes bya ba ste kha dog ljang gu'o //
T02D1253:246a-12: shing chen po la gnas pa ni yi dags 'dus
T02D1253:246a-13: pa zhes bya ba ste du ba'i mdog can du
T02D1253:246a-14: blta bar bya'o // phyogs brgyad kyi dur khrod rnams ni mgo bcad pa dang /
T02D1253:246a-17: gsal shing gis phug pa dang /
T02D1253:246a-22: bya rgod dang ro langs rnams phat ces bya ba'i sgra sgrogs par byed de /
T02D1253:246a-23: ma lus pa kun kyang sngon gyi grub pa thob pa rnams kyis mngon par brtags pa'o //
T02D1253:246a-24: gnod sbyin dang srin po dang /
T02D1253:246a-26: sha za dang smyo byed dang /
T02D1253:246a-29: mkha' 'gro rnams kyis rnam par brgyan cing sgrub pa po rnams dang bcas par blta bar bya'o //
T02D1253:246a-31: 'dab ma sna tshogs ge sar bcas /
T02D1253:246a-32: sgo bzhi dang ni mtshams bzhi ru //
T02D1253:246a-33: sna tshogs padma'i ri bong can //
T02D1253:246a-34: tshangs pa dbang po nye dbang drag / gshin rje
T02D1253:246a-35: de bzhin gnod sbyin bdag / bden bral dang ni
T02D1253:246a-36: thags bzangs ris // dbus su bdud ni bzhi po dag / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dkyil gnas pa //
T02D1253:246a-37: 'jigs su rung ba'i snying ga mnan //
T02D1253:246a-38: de la gdan dbus ma'i steng du dbyangs kyi yi
T02D1253:246a-39: ge bco lnga las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor me long
T02D1253:246a-40: lta bu'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid do //
T02D1253:246a-41: de'i steng du gsal byed kyi yi ge sum cu
T02D1253:246a-42: rtsa bzhi las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mnyam pa nyid
T02D1253:246a-43: kyi ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid do //
T02D1253:246b-0: de'i dbus su @246b yi ge aam dang h'u% yongs
T02D1253:246b-1: su gyur pa las gri gug dang thod pa kha
T02D1253:246b-2: sbyor rang gi sa bon gyi snying po can so
T02D1253:246b-3: sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi ngo po nyid do
T02D1253:246b-4: // de dang de las rnal 'byor ma'i rigs dpag
T02D1253:246b-5: tu med pa'i sprul pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
T02D1253:246b-7: 'gro ba rnams sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin du byas
T02D1253:246b-8: nas de nyid du 'dus shing gcig tu gyur pa
T02D1253:246b-9: ni bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes kyi ngo
T02D1253:246b-10: bo nyid do // de nas zla ba dang nyi
T02D1253:246b-11: ma dang phyag mtshan dang sa bon yongs su gyur
T02D1253:246b-12: pa las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems
T02D1253:246b-13: dpa' 'chad par gyur pa'i kha dog dang dbyibs dang
T02D1253:246b-14: bo nyid do // / phyag dang mtshon cha can
T02D1253:246b-15: rang snang ba'i rig mas 'khyud pa nyid du chos
T02D1253:246b-16: kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ye shes
T02D1253:246b-17: kyi ngo bo nyid bsgom par bya ste /
T02D1253:246b-18: 'di ni mngon par byang chub pa rnam pa lnga'o //
T02D1253:246b-19: de nas bar snang la yi ge ho: gnyis kyis brten pa'i yi ge aam dang h'u% bltas la /
